fees.description: $48.09 (inc. GST) Special Meter Read fee. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$106.15 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is disconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$108.30 (inc. GST) fee may apply when your property is reconnected. This fee is passed through from your distributor and may vary.
$2.75 (inc. GST) Direct debit or Debit dishonour payment fee

electricityContract.terms: See our full terms and conditions to www.covau.com.au for details.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary the charges of this plan (including their amount, nature and structure) at any time by giving you a notice at least 5 business days prior to the effective date of variation.All prices listed are inclusive of GST except where indicated.

demandCharges.description: Demand Charge  All kW (c/kW Daily). Uses the maximum kW consumption from the meter readings within the period Mon - Fri, 07:00 - 17:00.

solarFeedInTariff.displayName: Feed In Tariff: Single Rate Solar FiT

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: This agreement continues until you or we end it.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: For information on additional fees, please visit our website : www.covau.com.au
